content: garden gate by gwen moeller reminiscent of picket fences this simple textured washcloth is perfect for all skill levels copyright 2020 by gwen moeller size notes approximately 7in/18cm square the size and stitch count can be easily modified just add or remove stitches in increments of two needles cotton sheds fibers the first time it touches water so make sure you i used 4 5mm us size 7 needles launder your washcloth before use gauge abbreviations approximately 4 5 stitches per inch bobble bind off co cast on notions k knit tapestry needle p purl st s stitch es yarn repeat instructions inside brackets the sample i made used knit picks dishie worsted weight 4 ply 190 yards per 100g skein 100% cotton in the colorway jalapeno any worsted weight yarn in 100% cotton will work for this project you will need around 40 yards or 20g per washcloth p a ge 2 | garden gate by gwen moeller pattern using a 30in/75cm tail co 33 using the long-tail method row 1 knit row 2 knit row 3 k2 p1 k1 p1 to last 2 sts k2 row 4 k3 p1 k1 to last 2 sts k2 row 5-40 repeat row 1-4 nine more times ten pickets row 41 knit bobble all stitches weave in ends p a ge 3 | garden gate by gwen moeller
